name: property
title: Property
description:
Sets a property for the target.
Properties are node scoped, so any property defined inside a node lives inside a node only.
A property can be defined multiple times, each time it is created it will overwrite the scope property value, creating a property inside the target will not modify the property created on the project level.

properties.description: Sets the name of the property. The name defined here will be used throughout the build file using ${yourname}.
Sets the value of the property
Sets the type of the property
properties.required: NO; it will assume as text

examples.description: Load content of file as Property
examples.note: The file path must be in the build folder or write the fully qualified path
